description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the information disclosure vulnerability in the Windows Resilient File System (Refs) associated with CVE-2024-43500:

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB update based on your system build:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2 (Build 10.0.26100.2033), apply [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284).
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (Build 10.0.22631.4317), apply [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285).
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (Build 10.0.22621.4317), also apply [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285).

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a critical information disclosure issue that could lead to unauthorized access to sensitive data.
- Ensure you are on the correct Windows 11 version before applying the updates.
- Backup your system data prior to installation to prevent any data loss during the update process.
